Abyss Cannon.card_desc: [Broadside] Hitting with Broadside grants you {scale=1|1} ammo

Abyss Spike.card_desc: [Harpoon] Harpoon now lodges into terrain and explodes for 1000 damage when enemies are nearby.

Blow the Man Down.card_desc: [Harpoon] Increase the strength of Harpoon's Slow by {scale=5|5}%

Dark Bargain.card_desc: [Short Cut] Standing near a Short Cut Heals you for {scale= 50|50} health every 1s

Expansive Vault.card_desc: [Short Cut] Your first jump within {scale=1|1}s of exiting Short Cut will be higher.

Hangman's Ire.card_desc: [Armor] Dropping to or below 50% health grants a {scale=150|150} health Shield for 3s.

Haul on the Bowline.card_desc: [Short Cut] Gain {scale=8|8}% movement speed for 2s after exiting a Short Cut

Heave Away.card_desc: [Broadside] Broadside hits reduce the cooldown of Harpoon by {scale=0.2|0.2}s

Hull Piercer.card_desc: [Harpoon] Reduce the cooldown of Harpoon by {scale=1|1}s.

Hurl.card_desc: [Harpoon] Harpoon has no cooldown and no longer slows enemies.

Mortal Skewer.card_desc: [Harpoon] Heal for {scale=80|80} Health when hitting Harpoon.

Plank Walker.card_desc: [Short Cut] Heal for {scale=100|100} Health when traveling through a Short Cut.

Reckless Barrage.card_desc: [Broadside] Hitting with Broadside heals you for {scale=50|50} health

Scuttle.card_desc: [Weapon] Your reload projectile now explodes in an area of effect

Sea Dogs.card_desc: [Armor] At 50% Health and below, receive {scale=5|5}% increased healing.

Abgrundstachel.card_desc: [Harpune] Die Harpune bleibt nun in der Umgebung stecken und explodiert für 1000 Schaden, wenn sich Gegner nähern.

Dunkler Handel.card_desc: [Abkürzung] In der Nähe einer Abkürzung wirst du jede Sekunde {scale= 50|50} LP geheilt.

Gro\u00dfe Schatzkammer.card_desc: [Abkürzung] Erhöht die Sprunghöhe deines ersten Sprungs innerhalb von {scale=1|1}s nach Verwendung einer Abkürzung.

Henkerszorn.card_desc: [Rüstung] Fällst du auf oder unter 50% Gesundheit, erhältst du 3s lang einen Schild mit {scale=150|150} LP.

Kr\u00e4hennest.card_desc: [Breitseite] Breitseite schleudert dich {scale=500|100} Einheiten in die Luft.

Leinen los.card_desc: [Breitseite] Treffer mit Breitseite reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Harpune um {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Mann \u00fcber Bord.card_desc: [Harpune] Erhöht die Verlangsamung durch Harpune um {scale=5|5}%.

Rumpfdurchbohrer.card_desc: [Harpune] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Harpune um {scale=1|1}s.

Schlachtschiff.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Schleudern.card_desc: [Harpune] Harpune hat keine Abklingzeit und verlangsamt nicht mehr.

Seeb\u00e4r.card_desc: [Rüstung] Bei 50% oder weniger Gesundheit erhältst du um {scale=5|5}% erhöhte Heilung.

Seemannsknoten.card_desc: [Abkürzung] Erhöht dein Lauftempo nach Verwendung einer Abkürzung 2s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

Sorgloses Sperrfeuer.card_desc: [Breitseite] Triffst du mit Breitseite, wirst du {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

T\u00f6dlicher Spie\u00df.card_desc: [Harpune] Triffst du mit Harpune, wirst du {scale=80|80} LP geheilt.

\u00dcber die Planke.card_desc: [Abkürzung] Verwendest du eine Abkürzung, wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Versenken.card_desc: [Waffe] Dein beim Nachladen abgefeuertes Projektil explodiert nun und verursacht Flächenschaden.

Arsenal maudit.card_desc: [Harpon] Toucher un ennemi avec Harpon redonne {scale=1|1} munition(s).

Bien aiguis\u00e9.card_desc: [Harpon] Toucher un ennemi avec Harpon vous rend {scale=80|80} PV.

Bombardement brutal.card_desc: [Bordée] Toucher un ennemi avec Bordée vous rend {scale=50|50} PV.

Bond amplifi\u00e9.card_desc: [Chemin de traverse] Pendant {scale=1|1}s après avoir emprunté un Chemin de traverse, votre premier saut vous propulse plus haut.

Canon abyssal.card_desc: [Bordée] Toucher un ennemi avec Bordée vous redonne {scale=1|1} munition(s).

Courroux du pendu.card_desc: [Armure] Passer sous 50% de santé donne un bouclier de {scale=150|150} PV pendant 3s.

Flot ininterrompu.card_desc: [Harpon] Harpon n'a aucun temps de recharge mais ne ralentit plus les ennemis.

Lance abyssale.card_desc: [Harpon] Harpon se fixe aux parois et explose en infligeant 1000 dégâts quand un ennemi s'en approche.

Loup de mer.card_desc: [Armure] En-dessous de 50% de PV, vous recevez {scale=5|5}% de soins en plus.

N\u0152ud de chaise.card_desc: [Chemin de traverse] Emprunter un Chemin de traverse augmente votre vitesse de {scale=8|8}% pendant 2s.

Oh\u00e9 matelot !.card_desc: [Bordée] Toucher un ennemi avec Bordée réduit le temps de recharge du Harpon de {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Pacte lugubre.card_desc: [Chemin de traverse] Rester à proximité d'un Chemin de traverse vous rend {scale= 50|50} PV par seconde.

Ruse de pirate.card_desc: [Harpon] Le ralentissement de Harpon augmente de {scale=5|5}%.

Sabordage.card_desc: [Arme] Le projectile post-rechargement explose en infligeant des dégâts de zone.

Supplice de la planche.card_desc: [Chemin de traverse] Emprunter un Chemin de traverse vous rend {scale=100|100} PV.

Abyss Cannon.card_desc: [Broadside] Dealing damage with Broadside grants you {scale=1|1} ammo

Abyss Spike.card_desc: [Harpoon] Harpoon now lodges into terrain and explodes for 1000 damage when enemies are nearby.

Blow the Man Down.card_desc: [Harpoon] Increase the strength of Harpoon's Slow by {scale=5|5}%

Dark Bargain.card_desc: [Short Cut] Standing near a Short Cut Heals you for {scale= 50|50} health every 1s

Expansive Vault.card_desc: [Short Cut] Your first jump within {scale=1|1}s of exiting Short Cut will be higher.

Hangman's Ire.card_desc: [Armor] Dropping below 50% HP grants a {scale=150|150}hp Shield for 3s

Haul on the Bowline.card_desc: [Short Cut] Gain {scale=8|8}% movement speed for 2s after exiting a Short Cut

Heave Away.card_desc: [Broadside] Broadside increases your reload speed by {scale=8|8}% for 5s

Hurl.card_desc: [Harpoon] Harpoon has no cooldown and no longer slows enemies.

Mortal Skewer.card_desc: [Harpoon] Heal for {scale=80|80} life when dealing damage with Harpoon

Plank Walker.card_desc: [Short Cut] Heal for {scale=100|100} Health when traveling through a Short Cut.

Reckless Barrage.card_desc: [Broadside] Dealing damage with Broadside heals you for {scale=50|50} health

Scuttle.card_desc: [Weapon] Your reload projectile now explodes in an area of effect

Sea Dogs.card_desc: [Armor] While below 50% Health receive {scale=5|5}% increased healing.

Spy Glass.card_desc: [Broadside] Enemies Within {scale=10|10}ft of Broadsides projectiles are revealed.

Acorazado.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumentas tu salud máxima en {scale=50|50} PS

Alejar.card_desc: [Cañón] Los impactos de Cañón reduce la recarga de Arpón en {scale=0.2|0.2} s.

Aluvi\u00f3n temerario.card_desc: [Cañón] Te curas {scale=50|50} PS cuando golpeas a un enemigo con tu cañón.

Arrojar.card_desc: [Arpón] Arpón ya no ralentiza enemigos y no tiene recarga.

Arsenal maldita.card_desc: [Arpón] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición al usar Arpón.

B\u00f3veda expansiva.card_desc: [Atajo] Tu primer salto dentro de {scale=1|1}s de salir del Atajo será más alto.

Ca\u00f1\u00f3n abisal.card_desc: [Cañón] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición si alcanzas a un enemigo con Cañón

Captura la bolina.card_desc: [Atajo] Ganas un {scale=8|8}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 2s después de salir de un Atajo

Condenado.card_desc: [Atajo] Curas {scale=100|100} PS cuando viajas a través de un Atajo.

Escabullir.card_desc: [Arma] Tu proyectil de recarga ahora explota en un área de efecto.

Ira del ejecutor.card_desc: [Armadura] Bajar al 50 % o menos de tu salud te otorga un escudo con {scale=150|150} de salud por 3 s.

Navajada mortal.card_desc: [Arpón] Curas {scale=80|80} PS cuando golpeas a un enemigo con tu Arpón.

Pacto sombr\u00edo.card_desc: [Atajo] Estar parado cerca de un Atajo te cura {scale= 50|50} PS cada 1 s.

Perforacascos.card_desc: [Arpón] Reduce el Tiempo de recarga de Arpón en {scale=1|1}s.

Perros del mar.card_desc: [Armadura] Si tienes 50 % de salud o menos recibes un {scale=5|5}% aumento de curación.

Pico del abismo.card_desc: [Arpón] Arpón ahora se clava en el terreno y explota infligiendo 1000 PS de daño a enemigos cercanos.

T\u00fambalo.card_desc: [Arpón] Aumentas el poder de ralentización del Arpón un {scale=5|5}%

Agarrado na Bolina.card_desc: [Atalho] Ganha {scale=8|8}% de velocidade de movimento por 2s depois de sair do Atalho

Andando na Prancha.card_desc: [Atalho] Cura em {scale=100|100} de vida quando atravessa o Atalho.

Arremesso.card_desc: [Arpão] Arpão não tem mais intervalo, mas não atordoa os inimigos.

Ataque Incessante.card_desc: [Artilharia] Atingir inimigos com Artilharia cura {scale=50|50} de vida

Barganha Sombria.card_desc: [Atalho] Ficar próximo ao Atalho cura em {scale= 50|50} de vida a cada segundo.

Canh\u00e3o Abissal.card_desc: [Artilharia] Atingir inimigos com Artilharia recupera {scale=1|1} de munição

Encoura\u00e7ado.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Espeto Mortal.card_desc: [Arpão] Cura em {scale=80|80} de vida ao atingir inimigos com o Arpão

F\u00faria do Enforcado.card_desc: [Armadura] Concede um escudo de {scale=150|150} de vida por 3s ao chegar a 50% ou menos da sua vida máxima.

Homem ao Mar.card_desc: [Arpão] Aumenta em {scale=5|5}% a força da lentidão causada pelo Arpão

Lan\u00e7a Abissal.card_desc: [Arpão] Arpão agora se finca no chão e explode causando 1000 de dano quando os inimigos estão próximos.

Levantando o Moral.card_desc: [Artilharia] Acertos com a Artilharia reduzem o intervalo do Arpão em {scale=0.2|0.2}s

Matilha do Mar.card_desc: [Armadura] Recebe {scale=5|5}% mais cura quando estiver com 50% ou menos de vida.

Muni\u00e7\u00e3o Amaldi\u00e7oada.card_desc: [Arpão] Acertar o Arpão gera {scale=1|1} de munição.

Naufr\u00e1gio.card_desc: [Arma] O projétil da recarga agora explode em área.

Ninho de Corvos.card_desc: [Artilharia] Artilharia impulsiona você para cima em {scale=500|100}.

Perfurador.card_desc: [Arpão] Reduz o intervalo do Arpão em {scale=1|1}s.

Salto Amplo.card_desc: [Atalho] Seu primeiro salto dentro de {scale=1|1}s após a saída do Atalho será maior.

\u0412\u043e\u0440\u043e\u043d\u044c\u04.card_desc: [Бортовой залп] Бортовой залп подбрасывает вас в воздух на {scale=500|100} м.

\u0413\u043d\u0435\u0432 \u0432\u0438\u0.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 50% и ниже вы получаете щит прочностью {scale=150|150} ед. на 3 с.

\u0414\u0440\u0435\u0434\u043d\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье увеличивается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041a\u0430\u0447\u043a\u0430.card_desc: [Бортовой залп] Попадания Бортовым залпом сокращают перезарядку Гарпуна на {scale=0.2|0.2} с.

\u041c\u0435\u0442\u0430\u043d\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Гарпун] У Гарпуна больше нет перезарядки, и он не замедляет врагов.

\u041c\u043e\u0440\u0441\u043a\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 50% и ниже вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% больше исцеления.
[Бортовой залп] Попадания Бортовым залпом исцеляют вас на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041e\u0433\u0440\u043e\u043c\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Короткий путь] Первый прыжок в течение {scale=1|1} с. после выхода с Короткого пути становится мощнее.

\u041f\u0430\u043b\u0443\u0431\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваш максимальный боезапас увеличивается на {scale=1|1} ед.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u0431\u043e\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваши снаряды взрываются и наносят урон по области.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u0433\u0443\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Короткий путь] Проходя по Короткому пути, вы исцеляетесь на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u041f\u0443\u0448\u043a\u0430 \u0411\u0.card_desc: [Бортовой залп] Попадания Бортовым залпом восстанавливают {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u0422\u0430\u0440\u0430\u043d.card_desc: [Гарпун] Попадания Гарпуном исцеляют вас на {scale=80|80} ед.

\u0422\u0435\u043c\u043d\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Короткий путь] Стоя рядом с Коротким путем, вы исцеляетесь на {scale= 50|50} ед. в секунду.

\u0428\u0430\u043d\u0442\u0438.card_desc: [Короткий путь] При выходе с Короткого пути ваша скорость передвижения увеличивается на {scale=8|8}% на 2 с.

\u0428\u043f\u0438\u043b\u044c \u0411\u0.card_desc: [Гарпун] Гарпун вонзается в землю и взрывается, когда к нему приближаются враги, нанося им 1000 ед. урона.

Cuma dziobowa.card_desc: [Skrót] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% na 2 s. po skorzystaniu ze Skrótu.

Drednot.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Dzia\u0142o Otch\u0142ani.card_desc: [Burta] Celne ataki Burtą przyznają ci {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji.

Dziesi\u0119\u0107 w skali Beauforta.card_desc: [Burta] Trafienia Burtą skracają czas odnowienia Harpuna o {scale=0.2|0.2} s.

Ech do czorta!.card_desc: [Burta] Celne ataki Burtą leczą cię o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Kolec Otch\u0142ani.card_desc: [Harpun] Harpun utyka teraz w ziemi i eksploduje, zadając 1000 obrażeń, jeśli w pobliżu znajdą się wrogowie.

Mroczny pakt.card_desc: [Skrót] Stanie w pobliżu portalu Skrótu leczy cię o {scale= 50|50} PZ co 1 s.

Przebijacz kad\u0142ub\u00f3w.card_desc: [Harpun] Skraca czas odnowienia Harpuna o {scale=1|1} s.

Przej\u015bcie po desce.card_desc: [Skrót] Leczysz się o {scale=100|100} PZ podczas podróży przez Skrót.

Rzut.card_desc: [Harpun] Harpun nie ma czasu odnowienia, ale nie spowalnia już wrogów.

Samozatopienie.card_desc: [Broń] Pocisk przeładowania wybucha teraz, zadając obrażenia obszarowe.

\u015amiertelna szpada.card_desc: [Harpun] Celne ataki Harpunem leczą cię o {scale=80|80} PZ.

Wielki skarbiec.card_desc: [Skrót] Twój pierwszy skok przez {scale=1|1} s. po skorzystaniu ze Skrótu będzie wyższy.

Wilki morskie.card_desc: [Pancerz] Jeśli wartość twoich PZ jest równa lub niższa niż 50%, otrzymujesz o {scale=5|5}% leczenia więcej.

Wisielczy humor.card_desc: [Pancerz] Jeśli wartość twoich PZ jest równa lub niższa niż 50%, aktywujesz tarczę o {scale=150|150} pkt. odporności na 3 s.

Wronie gniazdo.card_desc: [Burta] Burta wyrzuca cię w górę na {scale=500|100} s.

B\u00fcy\u00fck Kasa.card_desc: [Kestirme] Kestirme'den çıktıktan sonraki {scale=1|1} sn içindeki ilk zıplamanda daha yükseğe zıplarsın.

Cehennem Dikeni.card_desc: [Zıpkın] Zıpkın, zemine saplanır ve düşmanlar yanına geldiğinde patlayarak 1000 hasar verir.

Cehennem Topu.card_desc: [Alabanda] Alabanda ile hasar vermek {scale=1|1} cephane verir.

Cellad\u0131n Hiddeti.card_desc: [Zırh] Canın %50 ya da altına düşerse 3 sn boyunca {scale=150|150} Canlık bir Kalkan kazanırsın.

Deniz K\u00f6pekleri.card_desc: [Zırh] Canın %50 ya da altında ise %{scale=5|5} daha fazla iyileşirsin.

Esrarl\u0131 Pazarl\u0131k.card_desc: [Kestirme] Bir Kestirme'nin yanında durmak seni her 1 saniyede {scale=50|50} Can iyileştirir.

Halatlar\u0131 \u00c7ek.card_desc: [Kestirme] Kestirme'den çıktıktan sonra 2 sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} Hareket Hızı kazan.

\u00d6l\u00fcmc\u00fcl \u015ei\u015f.card_desc: [Zıpkın] Zıpkın ile hasar verince {scale=80|80} Can iyileşirsin.

Pervas\u0131z Yayl\u0131m.card_desc: [Alabanda] Alabanda ile hasar vermek seni {scale=50|50} Can iyileştirir.

Savur.card_desc: [Zıpkın] Zıpkın'ın bekleme süresi yoktur ve düşmanları yavaşlatmaz.

S\u0131v\u0131\u015f.card_desc: [Silah] Yeniden doldurma atışın alan etkili olarak patlar

Vira.card_desc: [Alabanda] Alabanda vuruşları, Zıpkın'ın bekleme süresini {scale=0.2|0.2} sn azaltır
